column3: Tourism; Oddar Meanchey Province: A fire broke out on the 9th floor room of  Sangam Resort and Casino
column4: causing injuries to 5 people.------The incident happened at 10:25 pm on March 3
column9: Oddar Meanchey Province.------ Source of staff working at the hotel said that the fire was caused by an electrical fault.------Firefighters managed to control the blaze and 5 people were taken to hospital in Anlong Veng for smoke inhalation injuries. ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/801971.html
